name: The Wandering Whale Port Fairy
description:
A piece of Victorian history and former home to the town founder, The Wandering Whale Port Fairy is one of the oldest heritage buildings in the historic seaside town of Port Fairy.

The hostel is your comfortable home away from home offering a variety of dormitory and single rooms for the solo traveller and a range of private rooms (some with ensuites) for couples and families. A fire place to keep you cosy in winter and a beautiful cottage garden complete with hammocks to relax in in the warmer months. Self cater in our fully equipped kitchen or outdoor BBQ. Free Wi-Fi, friendly managers and free boogie board and fishing gear hire. 

Ideally located, it's a relaxed base for exploring the coast. Located in the town centre, with lovely restaurants serving fresh locally caught seafood, beautiful beaches and picturesque Griffith Island Lighthouse a short stroll away. 

Kick back and experience all charming Port Fairy has to offer today!

The Wandering Whale Guesthouse Policies and Conditions:

- Cancellation policy: Flexible bookings allow free cancellation up to 48h before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the full price of your booked stay. Non-Refundable bookings are strictly non-refundable on cancellation.
- Check in from 14:00 to 20:00 (late check-ins welcome, early check-ins upon request. Please contact property for check-in instructions).
- Check out from 00:00 to 10:00 .
- Payment 48 hours before arrival date using credit/debit card registered at time of booking.
- Taxes included.
- Breakfast not included

General

- Reception from 09:00 to 11:00 and 17:00 to 20:00 .
CHECKIN during COVID19 4pm-5pm . Arrange alternate times by calling hostel.
- No curfew.
- Child friendly.

Please note, children are welcome at this property, but cannot be accommodated in the co-living (shared) rooms. Guests under the age of 18 must be accompanied by their legal guardian.

GROUP BOOKINGS: Groups of 5+ guests must be arranged with management prior to arrival. Group terms and conditions apply including security deposit.

Alcohol is permitted in moderation only.
